New Records: Oklahoma City Thunder won their 11th straight game
Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 35 points and added seven assists
Jalen Williams added 14 points and 10 rebounds
Pre-Game Insights: Ja Morant (shoulder) and Zach Edey (concussion protocol) were not playing for the Grizzlies
Post-Match Reflections: The Thunder opened a five-game lead over second-place Memphis
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City outscored the Grizzlies 42-19 in the second quarter
Desmond Bane had 22 points and nine rebounds for Memphis
